item.description:
This version of The Three Musketeers has a bit of steampunk and Milla Jovovich, who is wicked good at shooting guns while doing backflips. Airships doing broadsides with banks of cannons? Count me in!

Update

I now know the time of the movie - we will be seeing the 3d show at 7:15. Sorry everyone for not updating sooner. Normally I'm not into the 3d, but I have a scheduling conflict and I can't make the earlier non 3d show.

I will be wearing my red trucker hat with the meetup logo. If the movie is upstairs, I will be waiting at the tables near the front windows one hour before showtime, which will be 6:15. If the movie is downstairs, I will be across from the refreshment stand. We'll head into the theater 20 minutes before showtime, which will be 6:55. Yes I know that's awfully early when you add it to the 10 to 20 minutes of previews, but hey, it'll give you a chance to talk to your neighbor!

I strongly advise buying tickets ahead of time on fandango.com. 

If you miss the group before the movie, we gather outside the theater showing the film after the film ends. And then we go out for a discussion 'n' food 'n' beer. Or wine, or cocktails, according to your preference. :-)

Synopsis

The hot-headed young D'Artagnan (Logan Lerman) joins forces with three rogue Musketeers (Matthew MacFadyen, Luke Evans and Ray Stevenson) in this reboot of Alexandre Dumas' story. They must stop the evil Richelieu (Christoph Waltz) and face off with Buckingham (Orlando Bloom) and the treacherous Milady (Milla Jovovich). The action adventure is given a state of the art update in 3D.

Trailers 'n' Stuff

http://ThreeMusketeers-movie.com 

http://www.comingsoon.net/films.php?id=58698
item.how_to_find_us: See event description for how to find the group.
item.name: The Three Musketeers
